text: After playing FF7 and 8, Suikoden, and other PS1 rpg's, this soundtrack was always really unique to me. I still can't explain why. It's very alien. Which would make sense if you pick Claude and end up on an alien planet.

author: Romalian

text: This is probably my favorite Sakuraba soundtrack. There's just something magical and enchanting about this game, and the music is part of the reasy why. Full of reverb, great instrument choices, memorable melodies. If I had to name games that defined my gaming childhood, Star Ocean 2 would get a mention.
author: SupraDarky
